ewd123

Class Controller

  • java.lang.Object
    • ewd123.Controller

  • public class Controller
extends java.lang.Object
    A class to 'supervise' and 'control' the processes using the critical section in the EWD 123 experiment.
    [OMI-PDS]
    Version:
    1.00 - 27 Oct 2014
    Author:
    Gert Veltink, gert.veltink@hs-emden-leer.de

      Controller() 

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static void enterCS()
      Signals that a thread has entered the critical section.
      static void errorMessage(java.lang.String msg)
      Writes a given message to both the standard output and standard error stream identifying the current thread.
      static void leaveCS()
      Signals that a thread has left the critical section.
      static void message(java.lang.String msg)
      Writes a given message to the standard output stream identifying the current thread.

      Returns a random boolean value.
      static void sleep(long millis)
      Tells a thread to halt operations for a number of milliseconds.
      static void workInsideCS(long millis)
      Signals that a thread carries out some work within the critical section.
      static void workOutsideCS(long millis)
      Signals that a thread carries out some work outside the critical section.

      • leaveCS

        public static void leaveCS()
        Signals that a thread has left the critical section.

      • sleep

        public static void sleep(long millis)
        Tells a thread to halt operations for a number of milliseconds.
        Parameters:
        millis - the duration of the time spent in milliseconds.

      • randomBoolean

        public static boolean randomBoolean(double probability)
        Returns a random boolean value.
        Parameters:
        probability - the probability true is returned. 0: always false, 1: always true.
        Returns:
        the random truth value as indicated by the probability

      • workInsideCS

        public static void workInsideCS(long millis)
        Signals that a thread carries out some work within the critical section.
        Parameters:
        millis - the duration of the time spent inside the critical section in milliseconds.

      • workOutsideCS

        public static void workOutsideCS(long millis)
        Signals that a thread carries out some work outside the critical section.
        Parameters:
        millis - the duration of the time spent outside the critical section in milliseconds.

      • message

        public static void message(java.lang.String msg)
        Writes a given message to the standard output stream identifying the current thread.
        Parameters:
        msg - the message to be shown.

      • errorMessage

        public static void errorMessage(java.lang.String msg)
        Writes a given message to both the standard output and standard error stream identifying the current thread.
        Parameters:
        msg - the message to be shown.
